1.verse: Praise ye the LORD. Praise, O ye servants of the LORD, praise the name of the LORD.

2.verse: Blessed be the name of the LORD from this time forth and for evermore.

3.verse: From the rising of the sun unto the going down of the same the LORD'S name is to be praised.

4.verse: The LORD is high above all nations, and his glory above the heavens.

5.verse: Who is like unto the LORD our God, who dwelleth on high,

6.verse: Who humbleth himself to behold the things that are in heaven, and in the earth!

7.verse: He raiseth up the poor out of the dust, and lifteth the needy out of the dunghill;

8.verse: That he may set him with princes, even with the princes of his people.

9.verse: He maketh the barren woman to keep house, and to be a joyful mother of children. Praise ye the LORD.
